Koma'obonda bwa Igoro,
Koba omogoko.

5.
Nabo twabasabeire,
As'emambi'engiya;
'Mogok'ob'oichore,
Bun'ensoko y'amache.

title: 288 'Bwanchani Bwatogokia
content:
288 'Bwanchani Bwatogokia

1.
Bwanchani bwatogokia,
'Toroseri' enchera;
Botoinyoria kob'abaya,
'S'abande botambe.

Nyasae, Ere n'obwanchani,
Naintwe, Nabaye tore;
Bwanchani bwatogokia,
'Toroseri'enchera;
Botoinyoria kob'abaya
'S'abande botambe.

2.
Ens' ey'omoichano,
'Borwair' amakweri;
'S'obwanchani natoteme,
Gokonya chinkoro.

3.
Amatuk'akoera,
Tokoirwa igoro;
Natoter'agwo botambe,
'Bwanchani bwa Yeso.

title: 289 Nagokire Ng'a Tat'ore Igoro
content:
289 Nagokire Ng'a Tat'ore Igoro

1.
Nagokire ng'a Tat'ore Igoro,
'Teb'obwanchani bway'as'ebuku;
'Makumi'amange narorire ime,
Kobu'onsi Yeso nanyanchete.

Nagokire Yes'Anyanchete,
Nanyanchete, nanyanchete;
Nagokire Yes'Anyanchete,
Nanyanchete mono.

2.
Nonya nkomweb'erio natayaya,
'Nyanchete rioka nonya ngosira;
Nimotamer'er'oyonyanchete,
Gankoinyora bun'er'ankwerete.

3.
Onye kore gotera ndatere,
'Kero namororir'Omotoria;
Nakw'oko goika kare na kare,
"N'ogokumia ki Yes'Anyanchete.

title: 290 Yes'Omosani Bw'Abana
content:
290 Yes'Omosani Bw'Abana

1.
Yes'Omosani bw'abana,
'Be 'Mosani'one;
Mbwat 'okoboko mbe naye,
Botambe.

2.
Nyegerie nkine n'obuya,
'Matuk'onsi;
Aye nkwabet'omwana,
Nomanyete.

3.
Ndae ker'enchera,
As'obosae bwane;
Ng'ainie nkong'a
'as'ekeene kiao.

4.
Tontuguta, korend'ay'
ob'omosani'one;
Ninkoganetie botambe
as'obogima.

title: 291 Nimorigie Yeso Genkio
content:
291 Nimorigie Yeso Genkio

1.
Nimorigie Yeso genkio,
Nimwegere botambe,
Mbwati' Amabarato Aye,
Ntar'encher' enyerere.

Onyanchire Ee 'nyanchire,
Namanyire 'nyanchire,
Yeso 'Kanyancha 'gankwera,
Naki' ekio Mwancherete.

2.
As'aranchike ningende,
Tindi moke ningende,
'Nchera ase atang'aine,
Tindi moke komanya.

3.
Ingesieri ateneine,
'Botamero bw'ebibe,
Ninture orir' eira,
Aigwe anyigorere.

title: 292 Nkwarosire?
content:
292 Nkwarosire?

1.
Nkwarosire, gwaichanire
nagochandeka?
"Nchw'ateba,
Eri'aye otimoke."

2.
Naki ndamomany'erio
nch'asar'oy'okondaa?
"Nare amaot'
as'ebimo biaye."

3.
Ner'egutw'Omogambi
abekeirw'Omotwe?
"Maene negutwa,
Ko neyamagwa."

4.
Komonyora nagotunya
nki ndanyoreo?
"Obororo,
'meremo namaiga."

5.
Kondabwaterere nki
ndanyor'Omoerio?
"'Bokong'u mboere
ng'ete Yordani."

6.
Ndamobori' ang'ire
mbe oyoye nanyange?
"Takwanga igoro
nense nchieta."

7.
Korigia, gotunya,
korenda, nasesenie?
"Abachenu mwensi
iraneri ee."

title: 293 'Kero Yes'arwete Igoro
content:
293 'Kero Yes'arwete Igoro

1.
'Kero Yes'Arwete Igoro,
Gokwera abanyabibe;
'S'amabera taetaneti'
Abake buna nche.

2.
Akabarigi' abanene,
As'are kworokereria;
Bakamoretera abana,
Abake buna nche.

3.
'Monene tabaseretie,
Nigo abatigete as'are;
Tatigete ond'airane,
Omoke buna nche.

4.
Akarw'obogima bwaye,
'Batorie korw'amakweri;
Nomobui bw'ogotoria,
Abake buna nche.

5.
Abana momwanche bono,
Mokore ogwancha kwaye;
Momosabe, momobake,
Abana buna nche.

title: 294 Ntwe N'Abana B'Erwoti
content:
294 Ntwe N'Abana B'Erwoti

1.
`Ntwe n'abana b'Erwoti,
ya Igoro, ya Igoro
'Ntwe n'abana b'Erwoti,
Ter'as'orogendo;
Yeso omotang'ani
Atotebia ntoiroka,
'Mobwatie ang'e ang'e,
Ter'as'orogendo.

2.
Twatara kogenda nka,
Nka seito, Nka seito,
Twatara kogenda nka,
Ter'as' orogendo;
Gochi'omochi'otarore,
'S'obotuko botari,
Yeso ner'Omobaso,
Ter'as orogendo.

3.
Twarara n'omogoko,
'Mogoko, mogoko;
Twarara n'omogoko,
Ter'as'orogendo.
Twatar'as'orogendo,
n'echinkoro chinchenu,
Goika toyeror'enka.
Ter'as'orogendo.

title: 295 Rero Krist'Obokire
content:
295 Rero Krist'Obokire

1.
Rero Krist'obokire
Ha-le-lu-ya!
'Goro n'ense 'tebire
Ha-le-lu-ya
'Geturi Ki'obobui
Ha-le-lu-ya!
'Gor'etere 'nse itabe
Ha-le-lu-ya!

2.
Moy'Ar'Omonen'oito
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Amakweri kai are
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Agakwa atotorie
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Mbera teri na nguru
Ha-le-lu-ya!

3.
'Kobori'ogoikeranu
Ha-le-lu-ya!
'Rwanir'esegi obuire
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Makweri tamobueti
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Kristo oigoire Igoro
Ha-le-lu-ya!

4.
Toet'as' aetete
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Totuny'Omorai oito
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Korw'ense toirwe Igoro,
Ha-le-lu-ya!
Korw'ense toirwe Igoro
Ha-le-lu-ya!

title: 296 'Bana Bagater'Agwo Kare
content:
296 'Bana Bagater'Agwo Kare

1.
'Bana bagater'agwo kare,
'Kero Yes'arinet'etigere;
Hosana, Hosana,
Hosana Igoro mono.

Mater'omogoko,
'Bana bater'amater'omogoko,
Mater' omogoko,
Yes'anchet'amatera.

2.
Nanchete aigwe ogotera,
Komotogi'Omorwoti O igoro;
Hosana, Hosana
Hosana igoro mono.

3.
Natoter'ogoter'okuya,
Na baria Omogand'oborigwe;
Hosana, Hosana,
Hosana igoro mono.

title: 297 Monene Ng'Emeremo
content:
297 Monene Ng'Emeremo

1.
'Monene ng'emeremo,
Nkore as'omogoko;
Nonya timbwati nguru,
Ko ndigeti'emeremo,
'Mabok'ane neng'ea,
Merem'emeke nkore:

'Monene ng'emeremo,
Nkore as'omogoko

2.
Nyegene kand'omoke,
Amang'an'a Biblia;
Ntare chinchera chiao,
Nkore n'ogwancha kwao,
'Nkoro, 'Maboko nkoe,
Ngokorer'Omorwoti:

3.
Ninsimek'embusuro,
Nkor'emerem'emiya;
As'Obwanchani nkonya,
Ng'ikeranie nkwegene,
Nyorokie ngokorere,
'Meremo korwa bono.

title: 298 Riogi Rie Chibesa
content:
298 Riogi Rie Chibesa

1.
'Riogi rie chibesa,
'Kero chikogwa;
Ker'eyem'as'are,
Yes'achiire.

Igwa, Igwa, Igwa,
Igwa, Buna chikogwa;
Ker'eyem'as'are,
Yes'achiire.

2.
Chikogwa Korwa'as'
Amaboko' a bana;
'Keegw'ase Yeso,
korw'as' abana.

3.
Bono tor'abake,
Twaret'ebike,
'Kero twakinire,
Toret'ebinge.

4.
Totari na besa,
Tomo' obwanchani,
Nabiir'ebi'ebike,
As'Omogoko.

title: 299 Nasibiri'Amaboko
content:
299 Nasibiri'Amaboko

1.
Nasibiri'amaboko
buya bono mambia;
Akor'emeremo ya
Yeso goika boire.

'Magor'ane renda
'se mokong'ira;
Mokorere Yeso
bwek'emeremo.

2.
Ninyateg'amat'ane,
ntegerere buya;
Nyigw'eki amabok'an
'aranyare gokora.

3.
Amais'an'arend'amabok
'as'emeremo,
Tayakor'amabe
akore aya yeso.

title: 300 Yeso Ningotunyane
content:
300 Yeso Ningotunyane

1.
Yeso ningotunyane,
Naigur'okorangeria;
Nachire nkwegenete,
Ondae gochia nka.

Ningotunyane,
Ningotunyane;
Ningotunyane,
gochi'as'orandae.

2.
Yes'otantang'aneti,
Nigo ndasir'enchera;
Nche n'omwor' omorosu,
Aye n'Omonguru.

3.
'Boror' okoremerwa,
'Bibe mbintang'enchera;
Korende nkogutunya,
Nimbe n'oboremu.

title: 301 Yes'Onyanchire Bori
content:
301 Yes'Onyanchire Bori

1.
Yes'onyanchire bori,
Biblia yantebia;
'Bana bonsi nabaye;
'Re nare n'echinguru.

Yes'onyanchire,
Yes'onyanchire;
Yes'onyanchire,
Biblia yantebia.

2. .
Yes'okwet'onyanchire,
Nansibi'ebibe biane;
'Nyigorer'ebisieri,
'Rio nainche nsoe igoro.

3.
Yes'onyanchire mono,
Nony'ekero ndwarete;
'Re nandende botambe,
Nony'ekero nkorara.

4.
Nabe nainche botambe,
'Se chinchera ngoeta;
Nainche kondamwanche bo,
Nang'ir'enka ya igoro.

title: 302 Er'oyoraremeri' Emechando
content:
302 Er'oyoraremeri' Emechando

1.
Er'oyoraremereri'
emechando,
Agenderere gotuny'
Omotoria;
Kegocha tikeri
keramoonchore,
'Tig'eira yaye
kob'Omotari.

2.
Abakomorosia
nayar'amake,
Bagwetutukania
'R'anyora 'nguru;
Takobugwa rinde,
Narwanigwa saki,
Nekony'ekiagera
Ar' Omotari.

3.
Ay'otorwanerera
n'Omoika,
Twamanyire omwando
N'obogima;
Obobe mbotame,
Tinkwobo'ay'abanto,
Botuko na mobaso
mb'omotari.

title: 303 Nanyanchete
content:
303 Nanyanchete

1.
Nyas'aror'amaber'as'enyoni
gekogwa nse;
Onye bwanchete chinyoni,
Nainche nanyanchete.

Nanyanchete, nanyanchete,
Nainche nanyanchete;
Bun'anchet'ebike,
Nainche nanyanchete.

2.
Ebisicha bir'ense,
Nyasae abitonga;
Onye bwanchet'ebisicha,
nainche nanyanchete.

3.
Nyasa'agatonga bionsi,
chinyoni n'ebisicha;
Takweba abana baye,
Nainche nanyanchete.

title: 304 Naye? Ninche?
content:
304 Naye? Ninche?

1.
'Monto ng'asoe aria igoro,
Bwango iga, Bwango iga,
Abwanch'obonene bw'aroro;
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?
Atare 'nchera chi'edhahabu,
Aror'ebinto bi'ogokumia;
Aror'omogok' obanetwe,
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?

2.
'Monto ng'asoe aria igoro,
Bwango iga, Bwango iga,
Mwegenwa anyorerw'egutwa,
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?
'Monto ng'amoror'Omogambi,
'Siborwe korw'as'obororo;
'Gok'amo Ner'agwo botambe,
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?

3.
'Mont'ature ko giasiekirwe,
Bwango iga, Bwango iga,
Aigw'eriogi, "Tinkomanyeti,"
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?
'Mont'arangerie, ko taigugwa,
'Ker'egesieri giasiekirwe;
'Siri'ekeegwa ki'abachenu,
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?

4.
'Monto ng'atere kabuire,
Bwango iga, Bwango iga,
'Tere n'omogand' oborigwe,
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?
Ngegu y'edhahabu ng'akwanie,
'Banchwa bense batiganete;
Agiterwe as'obonene,
Naye? Ninche? Naye? Ninche?

title: 305 Bwanchani Mbori Bun'obwa Yeso
content:
305 Bwanchani Mbori Bun'obwa Yeso

1.
'Bwanchani mbori bun'obwa
Yeso, Botakoremerwa;
Goika toso'ase riicho
ri'Omoremb'o Nyasae.

Bwanchani bwa Yeso,
Botakorengeka;
Iran'as'obwanchani omosiru,
Yes'ogosoroire.

2.
'Riso ndiri buna eria Yeso,
Rikorora are;
'Motayayi takoru'as'oborabu,
Kogosira.

3.
'Riogi ndiri buna eria Yeso,
Eriansu risera;
Bun'eriogi riensok' ekwongora,
'Kero Ki'omorakera.

4.
'Nkoro teri buna eya Yeso,
Eichir'obwanchani;
Mbori boror'enkorekoigwa,
Er'atamanyeti.

title: 306 Motogie 'Nw' Abana
content:
306 Motogie 'Nw' Abana

1.
Motogie'inw'aban'abake,
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani;
Motogie'inw'aban'abake,
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani.

2.
Aka mbuya inw'abana,
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani;
Aka mbuya inw'abana,
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani.

3.
Mwanche, mwanche inw'abana,
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani;
Mwanche, mwanche inw'abana;
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani.

4.
'Bana mobeker'egutwa,
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani;
'Bana mobeker'egutwa,
'Bwanchani, 'Bwanchani.

title: 307 Koba Na Yes' As'enyomba
content:
307 Koba Na Yes' As'enyomba

1.
Koba na Yes'as'enyomba,
Mogok'omonge;
Mogok'omonge,
Mogok'omonge,
Koba na Yes' as' enyomba,
Mogok'omonge.
Mogok'omonge.

2.
Yeso ime ase tata,
Mogok' omonge;
Mogok' omonge,
Mogok' omonge,
Yeso ime ase tata,
Mogok'omonge,
Mogok' omonge.

3.
Yeso ime ase baba,
Mogok'omonge;
Mogok' omonge,
Mogok' omonge,
Yeso ime ase baba,
Mogok' omonge.
Mogok' omonge.

4.
Yeso ime as'abana,
Mogok'omonge;
Mogok' omonge,
Mogok' omonge,
Yeso ime as' abana,
Mogok' omonge.
Mogok' omonge.

title: 308 'Nse Y'omosalab'o Yeso
content:
308 'Nse Y'omosalab'o Yeso

1.
'Nse y'omosalab'o
Yeso Ninteneneo,
Ekiriri ki'egetare
'S'ense yarosire
Enka ere imas'eroro
Gotimok'enchera,
Korwa as'omobaso ogwoka
Nemechando rero.

2.
'Boigamo bw'omogoko,
'Botamer'obuya,
Ase obwanchani bore
Boumer'oboronge;
'Bagaka batari nenka,
Bayenyor' enk'eyio,
Nabe omosalaba as'ende,
Engasi ya Igoro.

3.
'Nse yekiriri kiaye
Ensemo moino,
Nere embera y'obwoba
Er'entamb' engare;
Gati yait' omosalaba,
'Mabok'ay'amboirie,
Buna omorendi as'enchera,
Korw'embera eyio.

4.
'Gor'asomosalaba
Amais' an' arora,
Ekieni ki'Omotori'one
Onchandekerete;
Nkor' eichire namariga
'Makumia abere,
'Makumia y'obwanchani bwaye,
N'ogotaisana kwane.

title: 309 'Monene Nare Ime Y'Ekalu
content:
309 'Monene Nare Ime Y'Ekalu

'Monene nare ime y'Hekalu,
'Monene nare ime y'Hekalu,
Tiga ense etegerere,
Ens'etegerere bosio bwaye,
'Ns'ekire, 'Ns'ekire, as'Are.
A -- men.

title: 310 Nar'ase Y'obotimoko
content:
310 Nar'ase Y'obotimoko

1.
Nar'ase yobotimoko,
Ang'e na Nyasae;
'Gw'ebibe mbikogochanda,
Ange na Nyasae.

Aye Yes'Omoboria,
Korwa ase Nyasae,
Ir'abwo baganyete,
Ang'e na Nyasae.

2.
Nar'as' okoremi 'okuya,
Ang'e na Nyasae,
'Gwo toumer' Omotoria,
Ang'e na Nyasae.

3.
Nar'as' obosibore,
Ang'e na Nyasae,
'S'omogoko n'omorembe,
Ang'e na Nyasae.

title: 311 Monene Ninkoigwete
content:
311 Monene Ninkoigwete

1.
Monene ninkoigwete,
Nganyet' eng'ana yao,
Nyigwet' okwane ondemie;
'Monene kwana bono;
Ningotegererete,
As'ari'onsi orantebie.

2.
Monen' onyator'erieta,
Eri' omonye nase nde,
Kwana nainche ntunye bwango,
Ndemete nsibogete;
'S'Omorisi'ararae,
'Kiriri Ki'egetare.

3.
Nonya nd'omoke, ochayire,
Tonseri 'otanyigweti,
Monene nomanyet' onsi,
Ayar'enkoro yane;
Nomanyet' okogania,
Kwana eri'onsesenie.

4.
Monene Kwan'ombek'ang'e,
Riogi riao riigweke,
'S'okoigwera n'omogoko,
Nimbwati' eng'ana yao;
Monene ninkoigwete,
Koranche kwana nainche.

title: 312 Bono Bwairire
content:
312 Bono Bwairire

1.
Bono bwairire Riagorobire;
Tobiswe naende 'Mosunte ime.

2.
Bono natorore Ching'enang'eni;
Ebitongwa bionsi Nkorara bire.

3.
Renda abarwaire N'abakoromwa;
'S'amaber'amange Tiga tomiamie.

4.
Ase obotuko 'Malaik'ao
Bache batorende Gatwararire.

5.
Erio agwo mambia Gatokoboka,
Tore abachenu 'S'obosio bwao.

title: 313 Mogoroba Kobwairire
content:
313 Mogoroba Kobwairire

1.
Mogoroba kobwairire,
Abarwaire bachire,
Ang'e naye Omonene,
Basabire obakonye.

2.
Naintwe bono mogoroba,
Twachire n'obob'obonge,
Nonya titokorochi aye,
Twamanyire nao ore.

3.
Omotoria seri'obwoba,
'Bande nabarwaire bare,
'Bande mbaragwancha buya,
Abande babosiririe.

4.
'Nde tari nogotimoka,
Taiy'otakoreti ebibe
'Bakogokorera buya
Beigwa mbanyabibe bare.

5.
'Koboko kwao nkwa nguru,
Ng'ana yao tekogwa bosa
Igwa bono mogoroba,
Ase obuya togwenie.

title: 314 Ntor'as' Orogendo
content:
314 Ntor'as' Orogendo

1.
Ntor' as' orogendo,
Kogenda igoro,
'Bomenyo bw'abaya,
Mogoko botambe,

Timori kogenda?
Timori kogenda?
Minto nchwo togendenka
seito igoro

2.
Ase ense eria,
Mbareo 'bachenu,
Tibari gwechanda,
Gose gochandeka.

3.
'Bisieri chindwaki,
Bikomekameka,
Mwateba timori,
Kogenda igoro.

4.
Nainw'abatayayi,
Igoro neyaino,
Mwateba timori,
Kogenda igoro.

title: 315 Yeso Atotebia Tomoreke
content:
315 Yeso Atotebia Tomoreke

1.
Yeso atotebia tomoreke,
Bun'etay' ekomoreka botuko;
Ense nomosunte 'Gotorabe
agw'as'ore Nainch'ase nde.

2.
Yeso atotebia tomoreke,
Arore obororabu tiborima;
Korwa igor' arora,
'Gatorabe agw'as'ore
Nainch'asende.

3.
Yeso atotebia tomoreke,
'Mosunt' Oetananire ens'engima;
'Bibe nobororo, 'Gatorabe
agw'as'ore Nainch'asende.

title: 316 Abang'ina Bakareta Abana
content:
316 Abang'ina Bakareta Abana

1.
Ker'abang'ina baretera
Yes'abana,
'Borokigwa'as'obotindi
bakabaseria;
Yes'akarora bagotam-
'agateba n'obwororo,
"Aban'abake nabach'ase nde."

2.
"Nimbaire mbabogori'
as'egekuba kiane,
Mb'Omorisia bwe
ching'ondi tagochiseria;
Kobarang'e chinkoro chiabo
mbameny'as'Obonene,
"Aban'abake nabach'ase nde."

3.
'Motori'Omuya
Okoarigani'abana,
Mbar' abange
batamanyeti rieta riaye;
'Motori' Omuya toigwe
gotogosaba otebe,
"Aban'abake nabach'ase nde.

4.
Bwango tig'abanto
b'ebisaku nechinse,
Bach'ase Yeso
batugute chisanamu;
Nabarab'erio bakomanye
Nyasae bw'obwanchani.
Beger'Omotoria bach'as'ore.

title: 317 Nkarora Omonto Orosete
content:
317 Nkarora Omonto Orosete

1.
Nkarora ase enchera,
Omont'oyom' orosete,
Akabwati' Omosalaba
Bun'omogendi omuya;
Orosire, nechingiki
chichire obosio bwaye,
"Ng'ai kwarusi'Omokia"?
agantebia "Okwegena".

2.
Na oyomo nkamorora
Ne ritimo na enguba,
Akarwana nechinguru
Eri'anyore egutwa;
Nonya orosire mono;
Tachieti kwemurungania,
"Ng'ai kwarusi' omokia"?
Agantebia "Okwegena".

3.
Nar'oyom' otiget'abasani
Bobosae bwaye,
'Gatig' esiko n'emegoko
Atar'as'obokong'u,
Nony'amatemw'areo 'Koroki-
'omosasok' obosio,
"Ng'ai kwarusi'omokia"?
Aganetebia "okwegena".

4.
Bun'abaeti as'orogendo
As'ense'eye yebibe,
Gochaywa, 'bokong'u, nogosikwa,
Nonya nas'embera,
Goika Omogambi ache
'Toire ntw'abasakore nka,
"Nki kiabaeire Omokia"?
Neke gioka, "Okwegena"

title: 318 Abanto Emeganda
content:
318 Abanto Emeganda

1.
Abanto emeganda,
Ne chianga chindabu,
Barina ase amare,
Kogenda Igoro;
Bakorir'okorwana,
N'ebibe bi'ens'eye,
Ebisieri mbimanorwe,
'Babui basoe.

2.
Batera Aleluya!
Ense na Igoro,
Amariogi y'amakano,
Arari'obobui;
Rituko ri'omogoko
'S'ebitongwa bionsi,
Emechando n'amakweri,
Biaerire bono.

3.
Rituk'erio abaya,
Nabaumerane,
Abakwete n'abasani,
Tibagotigana;
Amais'onsi ng'arabe,
Amarig'asire,
Chintakana nachinyore,
Abaibori babo.

4.
Reta ogotereka,
Ngwakweret'ababe,
Kora Korika ebuku,
Inchwo eri'ogambe;
Ika ay'Omonene,
'Banto mbaganyete,
Oroki'ekemanyererio,
Mogambi Omotoria.

title: 319 Mogambi One
content:
319 Mogambi One

1.
Mogambi one, ninkobake,
'Bonene nobwao,
Tinyeb'egutwa y'amagwa,
Ndae goika Kalwari.

Tinyeba Gethesemane,
Tinyeb'emechando yao;
Tinyeb'obwanchani bwao,
Ndae goika Kalwari.

2.
Nyoroki'embera Kwaraire,
Buna beumetie;
'Malaika bakarenda,
Ekero kwaraire.

3.
Nainche bun'ere Mariamu,
Nchiche n'ekeegwa;
Nyorokie oboina bwasie,
Ndae goika kalwari.

4.
Omonene nimbogorie,
'Mosalaba rioka;
Nsange emechando yaye,
Kwambogoreirie onsi.

title: 320 Nkwegenete Omonene Yeso
content:
320 Nkwegenete Omonene Yeso

1.
Nkwegenet' Omonene
Yeso Aye bweka.
Nkwegen'as'ogotorek'
okonene.

2.
Nkwegenet'as'okwabera
Ningosasime.
As'obuya n'amabera amaya,
Nkwegene.

3.
Ninkwegenete Ondae
Naye bweka igo;
Amatuko onsi
Nong'isanekie.

4.
Ninkwegen'ase chinguru
Chiao chitagwe;
Amang'ana ao
Okorua Nabue.

5.
Nkwegen' Omonene Yeso
Totiga ngwe nse;
Ninkwegene rioka
rioka Botambe.

title: 321 Ntang'ane Omotoria
content:
321 Ntang'ane Omotoria

1.
Ntang'ane Omotoria,
'Merinda y'obogima;
Neruma bosio bwane,
'Bitare nabintuba,
Bimbise Korw'as'ore,
Ntang'ane Omotoria.

2.
Nokirie emerindo,
Buna ng'ina Omwana;
'Merindo nekoigwere,
Korayetebie "Kira,"
Omogambi bw'enyancha,
Ntang'ane Omotoria.

3.
Ngoika ang'e n'engegu,
's'emerind' ekoruma;
'sende n'omotimoko,
Ko nyeegeget' as'ore,
Ninkoigwe Kogontebia,
"Toiroka ninkorae."

title: 322 Yeso n'Omotoria Bw'ogokumia
content:
322 Yeso n'Omotoria Bw'ogokumia

1.
Yeso n'Omotori'are bw'ogokumia;
Noyo bw'ogokumi'ase nde;
Abis'enkoro yan'as' egetare;
'Se chindoche chi'omogoko.

'Bisir'enkoro ime y'egetare,
'S'ekiriri ens'enyomo;
'Bisir'enkoro 's'obwanchani bwaye,
Na gontuba n'okoboko,
Na gontuba n'okoboko.

2.
Yeso n'Omotori'are bw'ogokumia;
Nig'agotang'emechando,
Ambogoria ase amabok'aye;
Ang'a chinguru botambe.

3.
Ansesenia nebisi'ebinge mono;
Ang'ichoria n'obochenu;
Kanaonchoirwe ninter'omogano;
Bw'Omoboria on'Omuya.

4.
Karambisi'Oborabu anyimokie;
Toumeran'as'amare;
Ntogie Ogotoreka n'obwanchani;
N'emeganda y'abachenu.

title: 323 Yeso n'Omosani On'are
content:
323 Yeso n'Omosani On'are

1.
Yeso n'Omosani on'are,
Nere bionsi ase nde;
'S'enkoro yane nabuete bonsi;
Nig'are bun'egesicha kie rigok'ase nde;
'Kinganetie nsibigwe mb'omogima.
'S'obor'andemia, 's'emechand'ambisia;
Antebia motwek' amakong'u onsi.

Ner'egesicha ekiya,
Ng'enang'eni endabu; '
S'enkoro yane nabuete bonsi.

2.
Er'ondusiri'ogwechanda,
N'obororo bwane;
Nere obotamer' as' amatemwa;
Natugutire bionsi pi,
Nony'emebwekano;
Korw'enkoro ner'or'omorendi, one.
'Nse yonsi yanyangire,
Na saitani antema;
Konde na Yeso nimb' omobui.

3.
Yaya ere tagontiga,
Gose Kombwatoka;
Ko mwegenete na komokorera;
Ongiteire n'omorero,
Tinkwoboa kende;
'Nyigotirie n'endagera ya Igoro.
Ninso' as' obonene,
Ndor'obosio bwaye;
'Se chindoche chiomogoko chire.

title: 324 Mbigusuigwe Aria Kaiwari
content:
324 Mbigusuigwe Aria Kaiwari

1.
Bororo, gwechand'okonge,
Biarosia chinkoro,
Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,
Yeso nare ang'e.

Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,
Kalwari, Kalwari,
Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,
Yeso nare ang'e.

2.
Tigera Yes'onsi rero,
Bwoba n'ogwechanda,
Mbigusuigwe aria Kaiwari,
Yeso nare ang'e.

3.
Mochandeku Yes'Arora,
mechando, mariga,
Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,
Yeso nare ang'e.

title: 325 Ndw' Obosibwa Nas'Emechando
content:
325 Ndw' Obosibwa Nas'Emechando

1.
Ndw'obosibwa nas'emechando
Nche nachire Yer'as'ore,
S'obosibore nomogoko
Yeso nagocheire;
Ndw'as'Oborwaire 'Rio ngwenigwe
Ndw'obotaka 'Rio ntenetakigwe
Ntig'ebibe Nchiche as'ore,
Yeso nagocheire.

2.
Ndw'as'obosoku bw'ogosinywa
Nche nachire Yes'as'ore
Nyor'Obuya bw'omosalaba,
Yeso nagocheire;
Ndw'as'obororo ombogorie,
Ntimoke nemorindo yense,
Ndw'as'obokong'u ntere ngoke,
Yeso nagocheire.

3.
Ndw'as' obotindi Nogwekaga
Nche nachire Yes'as'ore
Erio nkor'okogania Kwao,
Yeso nagocheire;
Nyetige meny'as'obwanchani,
Nyimoke ntig'ogokw'omoyo,
Nyiruruke buna riruma
Yeso nagocheire.

4.
Ndwe as'obwoba bw'amakweri,
Nche nachire Yes'asore
'S'omogok' oborabu bwa nka
Yeso nagocheire;
Ntam'obosareku ntatebe
Nyor'omoremb'ase riicho,
Ndor'obosio bwa'obosera
Yeso nagocheire.

title: 326 Mbwat' Omorisia
content:
326 Mbwat' Omorisia

1.
Mbwat' Omorisia Oyonyanchete;
Ansesenia nche Ntanyare kwera;
'S'Omosalab' agachandek' agakwa;
Erio meny' as'obwanchani bwaye.

Gotunya Yeso kera rituko;
Kende nkegonsaria kare nainche;
'Mosunte gose omobaso;
Yes'omorisi' one nere bionsi.

2.
'Borisi'obonge aru'ase tore;
Mache aeta ng'ora ase'nde,
'Buya n'amabera bintunya nchera;
Tinkoremerwa kare nainche.

3.
Kondatayaye nsire enchera;
Ere nang'use 'ng'iranie nchera,
Nonya nobokong'u Nche tinkwoboa;
Morisi'Omuya Nandende rioka.

4.
Merem' eere Rogendo boigo;
Ere nandae gochia Bwone nka,
Agw'ase ndamenye 'Mogoko bori;
Nabanchwa ase Amagor' Aye.

title: 327 Mang'an' Omonw'one
content:
327 Mang'an' Omonw'one

Mang'an'omonw'one,
Nebirengererio bi'enkoro,
Biancherwe ase ore,
Naye chinguru n'Omotoria,
Amen.

title: 328 Ter' Ogotera Okuya
content:
328 Ter' Ogotera Okuya

1.
Ter'ogotera okuya,
Ret'amasari'amaya;
Seria omoichano bwonsi,
'S'ogotogi 'okonene,
Moterer 'otorendire,
Koumer'abasani;
'Riogi riaye ritwegeria,
Ncher'as'amagor'aye.

Tera Ogotera
'Gotera kw'omogoko;
(Tera Ogotera)
Tera Ogotera,
Koria kw'obobui;
(Tera Ogotera)

2.
'S'omogoko ter'orabe,
Ntoike rituk'erio;
Twora Hosan'omogoko,
Erio tomosasime;
Toter'obonene Bwaye
'Moki'ebirengererio;
Teb'omogano o kare,
Bwanchani bw'ogotoria.

3.
O mbuya! Tat'Omochenu,
'S'amabera y'omwaka;
Gotok'ase ker'enkoro,
'Gotogia gw'ekeenee,
O mbuy'Omotori'Omwanchwa!,
Gontori'as'amanyinga;
Totweri'Omoik'Omochenu,
Tung'us'ase Nyasae.

title: 329 Obonene Ase Tata
content:
329 Obonene Ase Tata

Obonen' ase Tata, n'Omwana,
N'Omoik'Omochenu,
Buna Yar'omochakano,
Nab'ere goika kare. Amen

title: 330 Borabu Ndae
content:
330 Borabu Ndae

1.
Borabu ndae as' omoichano,
Ndae rioka,
Obotuko, ng'arende korwa nka,
Ndae rioka,
Ndend' amagoro;
Timboreti korora egeka,
Kogoro okomo kong'isane.

2.
Tinanarete iga, gosaba ng'a,
Ay'ondae
Nigo nanchete gochor' ayane,
Bono ndae.
Ngancha omogoko ko inde omwoba,
Nkaenena,
Toinyor' ayaetire.

3.
Chinguru chiao chiansesenirie,
Nchindae rioka
As'amanani nas' emerindo,
Goika bokie
Kobwakire 'Malaika bagoka,
'Banyanchete ko bansireirie ake.

title: 331 Gosira Korw'ase Yeso
content:
331 Gosira Korw'ase Yeso

1.
Gosira korw'ase Yeso,
Gochia ase abe;
Gosira botuko 'Mobaso,
Gosira aye bweka.

Gosira korw'ase Yeso,
korw'obwanchani bwaye;
Ng'ora eker'agokorangeria,
Ngosir'ore korw'as'Are.

2.
Gosira korw' ase Yeso,
'Yorakogusuyie;
Gosira botuko 'mobaso,
Gosira korwa as'Are.

3.
Gosira korw' ase Yeso,
kogenda moeneno;
Gosira botuko 'mobaso,
Gochia 'ngongo chi'obobe.

4.
Gosira korw' ase Yeso,
Malaika beumia;
Ning'otera' somogoko,
korw'as'endib'etambe.

title: 332 Totere Bono
content:
332 Totere Bono

1.
Totere bono totere n'omogoko
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito;
'Kanisa entigari nero erabue,
'S'egek'egeke' ntoike seeito.

Ee nabo bwango,
Ee nabo bwango,
Natoike Igoro,
Natobaror'abatigari ba Yeso,
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

2.
Tokore bon'emeremo n'amaboko
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito;
'Buya bwa Tata nabotoe chinguru,
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

3.
Abw'abarosu tonyare kobaremia,
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito;
Natoboroki'abareu obwanchani,
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

4.
'Mogoko ang'e ore n'ogotima.
'S'egek'egeke ntioke seito;
N'amariga takob'as'omochi'oria,
'S'egek'egeke ntoike seito.

title: 333 Mobake Nyasae
content:
333 Mobake Nyasae

1.
Mobake Nyasae, Mogambi ore Igoro;
Oyore' emiaka yonsi, Omwanchanii;
'Monene Yehova, Ense na Igoro;
Twaribak'erieta riao, Ribakwe bo.

2.
Mobake Nyasae, 's'ogochika kwaye;
Ndw'as'ense ndigi'Omogoko, As'ar'ere;
Ntige bionsi ebiense, 'Bonene, chisemi;
Mokor' ere bweka koba, 'Nguba yane.

3.
Omoganda bwensi, Mobake Nyasae;
Tata, Omwana n'Omoika, 'Kero gionsi;
Motogie Nyasae, Mbwatisi'aba Igoro;
'Bonene bwensi n'obwao, N'ebako bo.

title: 334 Egetunwa Nkere Are
content:
334 Egetunwa Nkere Are

1.
Egetunwa nkere are,
Getabwati orwaki;
As'Omonen' abambetwe,
'Gakwa Atotorie.

O ng'aki atwanchete bori,
Naintwe natomwanche;
Tosemeri'amanying'Aye,
Na komokorera.

2.
Kegima titokomanya,
'Boror'Anyorete;
Korende igo twegenete,
Nintwe Akwerete.

3.
'Gakwa tonyor'okwaberwa,
Atokor'abaya;
Omoeri'Atoire lgoro,
'Manying'Atotorie.

4.
Taiy'ond'orenge konyara,
Goakan'esira;
Ner'oigoret'egesieri,
Kia Igoro tosoe.

title: 335 Inwe Abarwani Mweroisie
content:
335 Inwe Abarwani Mweroisie

1.
Intwe abarwani,
Mbweroisie kegima,
Mobe noboremu,
Mogende nomokia.

2.
Nonya bono segi,
Mobe nokwegena,
Oyo 'barangerie,
Nare amo ninwe.

3.
Gaki motenene,
Mobe nokwegena
Moyetache ense,
Omosunte bwonsi.

4.
Gaki motenene,
Mobe nokwegena
Moyetache ense;
Omosunte bwonsi.

5.
Nabae chiguru;
mogese kegima,
Timoba 'batamu;
Ase 'segi ime.

6.
Rigori mokobua;
Ne chinguru chiaye,
Igoro mogende,
Nobonene mono.

title: 336 Nar'Omosani Onyanchete
content:
336 Nar'Omosani Onyanchete

1.
Nar'Omosani onyanchete,
Kobua bonsi ab'ens'eye;
Nere Kristo Omochenu,
Omonen'Ere n'oyone.

N'oyon'Ar'O . . . mosani oyo,
Nare ang'e . . . 'Kero gionsi;
(Nare ang'e 'kero gionsi,
'kero gionsi);
Buy'obonge . . . 'moetanaine
('moetanaine)
N'amay'onsi Ere n'oyone.

2.
N'oyon'Are ekiagera,
Ankweret'erio ntoreke;
'S'omogoko 'mosasime,
Nimobak'Ere n'oyone.

3.
Ig'Ar'oyone ekiagera,
Are ime y'enkoro yane;
Bun'orosagia rw'omote,
Nde ime yay'Ere n'oyone.

4.
Ituk'erim'ase chinchera,
Chia Igoro nimoror'Ere;
K'amboanirie nintere,
'S'egeturi Ere n'oyone.

title: 337 Mobake Omonda Yeso
content:
337 Mobake Omonda Yeso

1.
Mobake Omonda Yeso,
Mo'ekengw'anso bono
Er'otwabeir'ebibe
Omogwenia oito;
Momobake, momobake,
Omogambi botambe.

2.
Mobake as'obwanchan
Aorogeti'ens'eye'
Mobak'Ere botambe,
Otosibiri'ebibe;
Momobake, momobake,
Ner'Oyo bw'ekeene.

3.
Buna Tat'ogotorenda
Ere otomanyire,
Atotaboria rioka
Korw'ase ababisa;
Momobake, momobake,
Abar'ang'e na aare.

4.
Amalaika mobake,
Inwe morochaine,
Erioba n'omotienyi
Bikomotung'amera;
Momobake, momobake,
Yes'Omond'O igoro.

title: 338 Ndater'Ase Yeso
content:
338 Ndater'Ase Yeso

1.
Ndater'ase Yeso, As'obuya bwaye,
Nigo nkonyora ogosesenigw'as'are;
Natoter'ase Yeso ekengw'anso kiaye,
Aiteret'amanyinga Omokonyi one.

2.
Ndater'ase Yeso amatuko onsi,
Kondanyare koinyor'obuya bwaye bwonsi;
Ndater'ase Yeso nony'as'emechando,
Ere nadende ase amaboko Aye.

3.
Ndater'se Yeso, Gonkogend'enchera,
Ning'use orogendo, ng'ike asare;
Nainche ninsoe egesieri keria,
Nimoterere Yeso, Igoro botambe.

title: 339 Ense Engiya
content:
339 Ense Engiya

1.
Gochi' as'ens'engiya ng'umbu,
Malaika bagotera,
Haleluy'as' Omotoria.
Hosan' as'Omogambi;
Togotara noboremu,
Tokoragwa na Tata,
Korw'ense y'ebibe
nobororo goch'ens' engiya.

Omogoko togoika,
Natobeke chigutwa;
As'ens'eria engiya,
As'ens'eyi' engiya ng'umbu.

2.
'Bachenu bande mbachit-
'asen'eyio riria kare.
'Ngaki bono yaerire,
Erio naintwe tosoe;
Ntogende bosio rioka,
Tobe nabwo batorigwe,
Ntotogi' Erieta riaye botamb'
as'ens'eyi' engiya

3.
As'ens'eyio obomenyo
bwarosigw'ase bonsi,
'Ba begenet' Omotoria
na koigw'eriogi riaye;
'Ngaki y'omogoko ngoch'er-
'Omonen' arachike,
Toyetig'ense ey'embe,
Togend' as'ense'eri engiya.

title: 340 Abakoreri B'Enchili
content:
340 Abakoreri B'Enchili

1.
Inyora abaisraeli,
Bakemurunganeria Musa;
'Ndamwamu ya Nyasa'egacha,
Basirera as'eroro.

Datani, Kora, Abiiramu,
'S'endamwamu y'oborai;
Rikamanoka bakarimera,
Nekiorokereri'ase tore.

2.
'Moik'omochenu abarae,
Timobek'endamwamu bosio;
As'ogochor'abakoreri,
Toma Enchili ense yonsi.

3.
Abachorwa b'obokoreri,
Timomenya Yerusalemu;
Mwarangerigwe Makedonia,
Genda o erio mobakonye.

'Monene Yeso'orangerie,
'Bange bakur'as'ebibe!
'Manying'abo narigigw'as'ore,
Otachieti eri'obokonye.

4.
Mbwachani bwa kerengo ki obo?
'Monene gokwa igoro yaito;
Erio tonyare koborigwa,
'Babe twabeir'abana baye.

title: 341 'S'Emambia Y'okobokigwa
content:
341 'S'Emambia Y'okobokigwa

1.
'S'emambia yokobokigwa,
getureri nkebuge,
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.
'Bachenu mbachenge gocha,
'mariga takobao, Ntoboke
(Halleluya! 'mambi eyio Natoboke)
Ntoboke.

(Ntoboke) Halleluya
(Ntoboke) Amen
Ntoboke (Halleluya)!
'S'embambia yokobokigwa
Ker'amakweri arabugwe,
Ntoboke
(Halleluya 'mambi'eyio Natoboke)
Ntoboke.

2.
'Semambia yokibokigwa naki'
Mogand'orabe!
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.
Tata, Baba, Banchwa bonsi,
kero torarorane, Ntoboke
(Halleluya 'mambi'eyio Natoboke)
Ntoboke.

3.
'Semambia yokobokigwa
'Birengereri'ebiya,
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.
Morore Motori 'omwanchwa,
Bwerwete agankwera, Ntoboke
(Halleluya' manbieyio Natoboke)
Ntoboke

4.
'Semambia yokobokigwa,
Ntoumeran' amare,
Ntoboke (Halleluya) Natoboke.
Ntoirwe as'obonene'
s'enk'engiy'ekomesa, Ntoboke
(Halleluya! Mambi'eyio Natoboke)
Ntoboke.

title: 342 Omochie Omuya zayoni
content:
342 Omochie Omuya zayoni

1.
'Mochi'omuya nore aria ng'umbu,
'Makweri taiyo nonya mbororo,
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni
As'agiy'omogoko botambe
As'agiy'omogoko botambe,

'Mochi'omuya, (Zayoni)
Zayoni n'omochie bw'abachenu;
(Zayoni)
Tomenye o, (Tomenye)
Tobe n'omogok'omonge mono,
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni
Yeso tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni.

2.
Abarameny'omochi'o Zayoni,
Mbaria babegete 'yanga ndabu
Yeso ner'orab'omobaso' obo,
Botuko mbokoba o naende,
Botuko mbokoba o naende.

3.
Nkarigereri'omochi'o zayoni,
Nkaba n'okogania 'nso'aroro;
Yes'ombwat' okoboko Onyimokie
Erio nsoe omoch' O Zayoni
Erio nsoe omochi o Zayoni

Yeso mbwate, (koboko)
'Koboko nso'omochi'o Zayoni;
(Zayoni)
Nyimokie nche (Nyimokie)
Ng'ikarans'okoboko kwao
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria (Zayoni x2)
Yeso Tata ng'ir'aria Zayoni.

title: 343 'S'Eri'eta Ria Yeso
content:
343 'S'Eri'eta Ria Yeso

'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso,
'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso;
Ntore Nobobui!
'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso;
'S'Eri'eta ria Yeso
Saitani natame!
'Ng'oratobue Togwatora
Eriet'eri RINENE?
Yeso; Yeso; Yeso; Yeso!
"Ntore N'obobui"

title: 344 'Botuk 'Obochenu
content:
344 'Botuk 'Obochenu

1.
'Botuk'Obochenu,
'Boser'Oborabu
Bor'ase ng'ina n'omwana,
'Mwan'omochenu Omoitongo,
'Raire n'omorembe,
'Raire n'omorembe.

2.
'Botuk'Obochenu,
'Borabu bwachire,
'Malaika bagotera;
Alleluyah 's'omogambi!
Oiboirw'Omotoria,
Oiboirw'Omotoria.

3.
'Botuk'obochenu
Omwan'o Nyasae,
'Borabu bwarwa a'sare;
Bogotori'as'obuya,
Oiborw'Omonene,
Oiborw'Omonene.

3.
'Botuk'obochenu,
Ng'enang'eni raba
Totere n'amalaika;
Alleluya 'Mogambi!
Oiboirw'Omotoria,
Oiboirw'Omotoria.

title: 345 Kira Tegerera
content:
345 Kira Tegerera

1.
Kira tegera,
'Kemonyo nkere,
Kira tegerera,
Toigwe ring'ana.

Tara ng'or'Omonene
nao Are aa,
Tara ng'or'Ateba,
Tosuke ang'e.

2.
Kira tegerera,
N'achenu aas'aa,
'Matabau atebe
Ng'ana ri'obuya.

3.
Kira tegerera,
Torw'ogosaba,
Tun'ay'Edeni,
Tosange amo.

4.
Kira tegerera,
Amaber'Aye,
Kira tegerera,
Gany'Omonene.

title: 346 Twarema Emegondo
content:
346 Twarema Emegondo

1.
Twarema emegondo,
Na koyebusura,
Nyasae orw'embura,
N'oborendi obuya;
Areta riberera,
Areta 'mbokendu,
'Mbe'engiya n'omobaso,
N'embura y'okwamia

Ebiegw'ebiya,
Nigoro bikorwa,
Mbuya, Mbuy' as'Omonene,
's'obwanchani bwaye.

2.
Mbuya, Tat'Omwachani,
As'amaya onsi,
Risimeka, rigesa,
'Bogima, 'ndagera;
Ntobwati ebitorarwe,
As'obwanchani obo,
Ko ekioganeti'Aye,
Ne chinkoro chiato.

3.
Titokoba'abande,
Bun'Er'atoeire!
Tobakony'abanto,
Kogenda Igoro;
Torw'esadaka yaito,
Yangoyi 'abotomwa,
Bwa Kristo im'as'ense,
N'ogotoreka bo.

title: 347 Yeso Nguru Chiane
content:
347 Yeso Nguru Chiane

1.
Yeso nguru chiane,
Nko' ogwenchanda kwane;
Nkwegen'as'obokanyeku,
'Gw'ogosaba kwane.

2.
Ing'enkor'engiya,
Erio nyeange nche;
Tintara chinchera chimbe,
Na tingoki'amabe.

3.
Ing'enkor'endemu,
'S'emechando yonsi;
'Nyoteneni'Omasalaba,
'Nyorende bokong'u.

4.
Ing'ogokoiroka,
N'eriso eriongo;
Gokorigereria Aye,
K'ebibe bir'ange.

5.
Ong'e na Omoika,
Ore ang'e rioka;
'Y'orendet'ekero gionsi,
Ase ogosaba.

title: 348 'Ng'ana y'Omonene
content:
348 'Ng'ana y'Omonene

1.
Ng'ana y'Omonene,
'Torae botambe
Oyoriegenete,
Nanyor'Omogoko.

2.
'Babisa mbabao,
Ntonyore chinguru,
'Ng'ana ri'okoremia,
'Ret'ogotoreka.

3.
K'emerind'egocha,
N'amar'atotuba,
'Ng'ana riao ribe,
Eng'ay'as'enchera.

4.
Ng'oranyare kwera,
'Mogok'ore naki,
Oyotwanyorire,
Korw'ase ring'ana?

5.
'Ng'ana y'amabera,
As'abare moyo,
Rikorw'oboremu,
Ase abagokwa.

6.
Gatwamanyire bo,
Obochenu bwaye;
Togwanch'Omonene,
Tobe naye rioka.

title: 349 Yes'otorangeirie
content:
349 Yes'otorangeirie

1.
Yes'Otorangeirie Korwa,
'S'egeturi gi'ens'eye;
Botambe nkorangeri'are,
"Omokristo ntunyana".

2.
Naki aborokigwa baye,
Mbaigwet'okorangeria;
Bagatig'ebinto bionsi,
Babakorer'abande.

3.
'Torangeirie totige
gosasim'emegwekano;
Ateba "Mokristo nyanche
mono kobua ense".

4.
'S'amatuko yomogoko.
Nonya nay'emechando;
Arangeria, "Omokristo;
Nyanche mono kobua"

5.
'Torangeiri'as'amabera,
Tokony'erio tokoigwe;
Tokoigwere na kogwancha,
Togokorere buya.

title: 350 'Malaika A Ayasaye Bamenye
content:
350 'Malaika A Ayasaye Bamenye

1.
Malaika a Nyasaye bamenye;
Ang'e ange, ang'e naintwe;
Nabakonye abegeni; Botambe.

O rire ri'omorero,
rire ri'omorero,
Ntang'ana inche botambe
O rire ri'omorero,
rier ri'omorero,
Ntang'ana goika igoro.

2.
Emechando ker' as' enchera
Natokonye, natokonye;
Natonyor' obotamero As'Are.

3.
As' orogendo rwaito rwonsi,
Omonene, Omonene,
Natotang'ane botambe As'ens'eye.

title: 351 'Moe Yes'ebibe Biane
content:
351 'Moe Yes'ebibe Biane

1.
'Moe Yes'ebibe biane,
'Ng'ondi ya Nyasae,
'Bibogori'antimokie,
Korw'as'emechando.

2.
'Moe 'Kogania Kwane,
Oyo bw'oboikeranu,
Angwenia Oborwaire,
Abori'omoy'one.

3.
'Moe 'bororo bware,
N'ogwechanda gwonsi,
Nansibore Korwa o,
'Sange nainche onsi.

4.
Nganetie mobwekane,
'Mwororo, 'moitongo
Ngwekane buna Yeso,
Omwan'O Nyasae.

title: 352 'Monene Ituko Riaerire
content:
352 'Monene Ituko Riaerire

1.
'Monene ituko riaerire,
Obotuko bwaikire;
Natokobake n'ogotera,
'Motimok'osesenirie.

2.
Twairaneirie buya'as'ore,
'Kanisa yao terairi;
Nig'erendete'as'ens'engima,
'Botuko n'omobaso bo,

3.
Igor'as'ebisinka bionsi,
Boira, bwakia kera rituko;
'Riogi ri'ogosaba ndiereti,
Nonya neriogokobaka.

4.
Borwoti bwao mbokoera.
Buna amanda y'ens'eye;
Mbokine rioka goika Kare,
Bana bao bair'omwando.

title: 353 Nimenye As' Egetunwa
content:
353 Nimenye As' Egetunwa

1.
Nimenye as' egetunwa,
As' omobaso 'muya;
'Mochie bw'obuya obonge,
Aase ay'omogambi.
Ens' ere n' omoik' omuya,
Ebisicha bikwama,
Ase engegu y'ensoko,
bitari kwoma rinde.

2.
Natonywe 'mache 'chinsoko,
Ense 'nyia toramenye;
Amache ay'obogima
Tonywe toisaneke;
Titokoba na erang'o,
Gose 'gwechanda konde
Gatwanyorire emonga,
Etari gosareka.

3.
Moinyore 'mosalaba,
'Monene abambetwe,
Ase emechando y'ense,
Atworokie enchera;
Monene 'torangeirie,
Yoimokie 'mosalaba,
Nakoroseirie 'nchera,
Oraike Igoro.

title: 354 Oyo Nere, Ngoik' Are
content:
354 Oyo Nere, Ngoik' Are

1.
Oyo mere, ngoik' are,
Oria orwet' ense;
'Malaika bamokobe,
Koirana naende;
Haleluya!
Rituko riaye ng'ang'e.
Haleluya!
Rituko riaye ng'ang'e.

2.
Intwe twensi, tomorore,
Kagoika n'amare;
'Banto babe bairoke,
Mbamokorete bobe;
Nabarer,
Bakomorora ense.
Nabarere,
Bakomorora ense.

3.
Rituko erio agocha,
Toumeran' Igoro;
Na barabwo babokire,
Nbwo nabaonchoke;
'Banto 'bande,
nogokwa baganyete.
'Banto 'babnde,
nogokwa baganyete.

4.
Amakweri, n'oborwaire,
Nabiere kegima;
Obwanchani n'omogoko,
Nabomenye as'ense;
Haleluya!
Tonyore omorembe.
Haleluya!
Tonyore omorembe.

5.
Intwe twensi natomenye,
As'obosio bwao;
Chinguru chionsi nobwate,
Obutore ekina;
Nchuo 'Monene!
Intwe abanto bao!
Nchuo 'Monene!
Intwe abanto bao!

title: 355 'Kwegena Kw'Abatata
content:
355 'Kwegena Kw'Abatata

1.
'Kwegena kwa abatata!
Nonya bachandetwe moko,
Chinkoro chiaito chiagoka,
Gotwaigure ring'an erio,
Okwegena ogochenu!
Ntwegene goik' amakweri.

2.
'Batata ase chichela
'Basibor' ase chinkoro,
Mogoko ki abana babo,
Baisa gokwa bun'abaise,
Okwegena ogochenu!
Ntwegene goik' amakweri.

3.
'Kwegwena kwa aoatat!
Ntwanch' abasani, babisa,
Ntorandie Yeso kobua;
'S'obogima n'amang'ana,
Okwegena ogochenu!
Ntwegene goik' amakweri.

title: 356 Agwo Kare Yes'Omwanchani
content:
356 Agwo Kare Yes'Omwanchani

1.
Agwo kare Yes'Omwanchani,
Akoroki'ense obonene Bwaye,
Akarina etiger'emori,
Agw'abana bagatera, Hosana.

Hosan'Asare, Hosan'Aleluya;
Otocheir'as'Erieta ri'Omonene,
'S'Are Hosana 'bare igoro mono;
Kristo n'Omwan'o Daudi, Hosana.

2.
Oyi'Omorwoti obachire,
Nere Omworor'okworokereria,
Akarina etiger'emori,
'Banto bakarabi'enchera, Hosana.

3.
Tiger'ekagenda igor'ase chianga,
N'amat'amakendo bamwarerete,
Omochi'omogi'ogategokana,
Ng'oyio mogotogiamono, Hosana.

4.
'Bagak'emioyo yabo ten miya,
Tibancheti baegwe ogosikwa,
Bateba teri buy'Omonene,
Baigwe buna bagotera, Hosana.

5.
Ogotogia kogaikeranigwa,
Nab'abana bagotera Hosana,
Ogotogia kogaikeranigwa,
Nab'abana bagotera, Hosana.

title: 357 Nyasae Oito N'orwaki
content:
357 Nyasae Oito N'orwaki

1.
Nyasae oito norwaki,
Nguba nekerwanero,
Natokonye korw' obobe
obwo bwatobuire;
Omogambi bw' obobe
Oimokereirie igoro,
Bong'ainereri' obonene
'bekire 'kero eke;
As' ens' etari mosani.

2.
Ntokonyara kwerwanera,
Bwango nigo toraitwe,
'Monto nar' ogotokonya,
Nyasae bwek' omorure;
Mwaboria ning'o 'yo?
n'kristo Yes' akorokwa;
Omwan' o Nyasae;
Bweka, onde tari,
Orabue 'se 'segi.

3.
Nebirecha bikaer' enseye,
'Ganyete gotosiria,
Titwayabeka 'moyo ime,
Titogotobua 'ntwe;
'Mogambi 'gosaria.
Naba bun' arabe,
Takonyara nonya,
Nakio erikeire;
"Ring'ana" narimoite.

4.
Biblia se chinguru chiabo,
Tageka tekoera,
'Nki 'nkeba goikebue,
Nyasae arigete bweka;
Nachitour' obogima,
Nibo, bana, Nyomba,
Ng'eria yabo nenke;
Bionsi nabisire o
Nyasae otigare.

title: 358 Ari'As' Obweri
content:
358 Ari'As' Obweri

1.
Ari'as'obweri borere mbwareo,
Omwan'oyo Yeso nao araire,
Ching'enang'eni chikamomoreka,
Ase Yes'arareret' obonyansi.

2.
Chiombe chikwana chiatura Omwana,
Ko Omwana Yeso tari korera;
Nche ningwanchete Yeso ndigererie,
Mbesie Yeso goika mambia bokie.

3.
Mbere ang'Omonene nasabire,
Ombwate, Onyanche nagosabire;
Osesenie abana orendete,
Nario toragwener' agwo igoro.

title: 359 Natotere Bono Buya
content:
359 Natotere Bono Buya

1.
'Natare bono buya,
Ogotera ok'obuya,
Yeso Obuete ebibe,
Otokorire boronge.

Okobua, ebinto bionsi,
Tera ig'abanto bonsi,
Yeso Obuete ebibe,
Otokorire boronge.

2.
Nonya twanyor'as'ens'eye,
'Mechando n'ogotemwa,
Ring'an'eri narisane,
Otokorire boronge.

3.
Na Ka Yeso andangeirie,
Kogenda Igor'as'are,
Nin'ter'ogoter'okoyia,
Otokorire boronge.

title: 360 Tom'Omobaso
content:
360 Tom'Omobaso

1.
Tom'omobaso, 'mobas' omuya,
Omorek'ens'oseri'emechando,
Abaminto bonsi baganyete;
Tom'omobas'omuya.

Tom'omobas'omuya,
Tom'omobas'omuya,
Tom'omobaso, tom'omobaso;
Tom'omobas'omuya,

2.
Tom'omobaso chinsa chionsi,
Mbare n'enchera ase ring'ana;
Simeka chimbusuro chingiya;
Tom'omobas'omuya

3.
Tom'omobaso rituko rionsi,
Ebisio nabisoe ase nde
Onde Tatoa tatiga Yeso,
Tom'omobas'omuya.

4.
Tom'omobas'emiaka yonsi;
Goika Yes'airane ase ense,
Erio twensi natogende Igoro,
Tom'omobas'omuya.

title: 361 Intw' Abarwani b'Omonene
content:
361 Intw' Abarwani b'Omonene

1.
Intw'abarwani b'Omonene,
Oyore nokobua,
Twarir'eira y'okorwania,
Mobere n'ebibe.

Bon'Omonene natokonye
Toserie Saitani;
Bon'Omonene natokonye
Toserie saitani.

2.
'Bamonto mwensi motenene,
As'ebender'eye,
Togende amo n'Omonene,
Omorwoti o igoro.

3.
'Kemanyererio twanyorire,
'Kero ki'ebatiso,
Bamura n'abaiseke mwensi,
Moinyore Kristo.

4.
Timwancha mobe abasomba
B'omorwoti bw'ense,
'Moik'O Nyasae nabarae,
Timorengereria.

5.
Mogende amo n'ogosaba,
Moramoki'amaiso,
'Motemi bw'ens'eker'agocha,
'Nyore morendete.

title: 362 Ning'o Bw'Omonene?
content:
362 Ning'o Bw'Omonene?

1.
Ning'o bw'Omonene, ning'ore ang'e?
Abanto barigetie kogend'esegi;
Ning'o origeti'aret'abamwabo,
Bache gokonyeka tibacha gosira?

Ogokonya nokwao n'obuya bwonsi,
Ogokonya nokwao n'obuya bwonsi;
Ntob'ensemo yao 'Monene botambe.

2.
Tindigeti'obonene gos'ogosikwa.
Gatwasoir'egonde ya Yes'Omuya;
Intwe n'obwanchani bwatoretire!
Oyorangerigwe Oyio noyoye.

3.
Agatogora tari n'edhahabu.
Rigori'ri'amanyinga eri'ogokumia;
Yes'otoichoiri'Omoik'Omochenu,
Twatigir'ebibe, Nabaye tore.

4.
Esegi nendoro tiga torore,
Oyorayebu'egonde y'Erwoti;
Nse as'ebendera twatenenire,
Nao torabuere na'omorembe.

title: 363 Omoy'one Igwa
content:
363 Omoy'one Igwa

1.
Omoy'one oki' etaya yao,
Buya tongia bwang'aiga tari mwao;
Chinguru chi' ense chionsi chireo,
Igorabue chionsi, koranche Yeso.

2.
'Mobisa Saiatani chinguru chiaye,
Yeso ochibuire nogokwa
'Nguru tori, tori 'moremu,
Aye nomwororo, mwororo mono.

3.
Imoka ne mambia obotong'ane,
Saba mono, tur' emiaka yonsi
Esegi nekare, obe namaiso,
Oboe ne chinguru chisonsi chia Iso.

4.
Omonene Yeso nere Omorisia,
'Ng'ana y'omonene nokobua
Igoro naete nense naende
'Ng'ana y'omonene ig'eragende.

title: 364 Omonene Ng'ang' Are Gocha
content:
364 Omonene Ng'ang' Are Gocha

1.
Omonene ng'ang' Are gocha,
'Banto bateba;
Ng'enang'eni chiarimire,
Nebe ogokia kwe rituko.

Ee neb'gokia kwe rituko!
Ee nebi'Ogokia kwe rituko!
'Botuko mboere, rituko richiche;
Ee neb'ogokia Kwe rituko.

2.
Ebimanyererio biabeire,
Risase n'omotienyi;
'Kurat'as'abanto bonsi,
Ogocha kw'Omonene ng'ang'e Kore.

3.
N'eng'aki as'ekanis'enganyi,
Gotig'obweanchi;
Korenda, gwokia chitaya,
Baganye rituko rigokia.

4.
Genda bwango as' ebinchera,
N'epar'enene bo;
Ranger'ebirema, 'meuko,
Babe ang'ase rituk'erio.

title: 365 Yeso Omonene Nyigwa
content:
365 Yeso Omonene Nyigwa

1.
Yeso Omonene nyigwa,
'Go ndasir'ontankonyeti;
Ong'obuya bwa'Obonge,
Naboigo ng'ira.

2.
Nche n'omonyen'ebibe,
'Manyinga'o nyegenete;
Kondach'as'ore, tokwanga,
Naboigo ng'ira.

3.
Okoegwa kw'ogokonyeka,
Komanya nindengererie;
Ndich' as'ore rebisanyi,
Naboigo ng'ira.

4.
As'origetie gontoma,
Ntoma nainche nindegende;
Ime na isiko n'obuya,
Naboigo ng'ira.

5.
As'origetie ong'e buya,
Ng'a n'obwanchani oboyia;
Ime na Isiko boichore,
Naboigo ng'ira.

6.
Erio esegi ekoera,
Nyuma okobua gokoera;
Nao abwo ndakorere,
Naboigo ng'ira.

title: 366 Natogende Intwe  Twensi
content:
366 Natogende Intwe Twensi

1.
Natogende intwe twensi,
as' emeremo yaye
Natokore nomogoko,
ne chinguru chionsi,
'banto bonsi baganyete,
as' ogokonywa gwaito,
Natobatang'ane bona,
enchera y'Omonene.

Nchwo togend', as' omogondo,
as' emeremo yaye,
Nonya 'meke, gos' emenge,
ninyekore nomokia,
'Banto bonsi, nimbakonye,
nobwanchani, nobuya,
Nchwo 'Monene, nkonye bono,
nkore emeremo yane.

2.
Natogende, aborokia,
as enyomba ya Nyasae,
Toborokie abanto bonsi,
chingencho chia Nyasae,
Titokwa Moyo,
as' ense tiga tosabe mono,
Erio natong'use abange,
ase Omokonyi Oito.

3.
Natokonye Abakristo,
as' emeremo yaye,
Kabe ang'e koyeimokia,
'mesigo 'merito,
Tab'ang'e gochiimokia
'gurube chindito,
Natoike seito bori,
as' Obonda bwa Yeso.

title: 367 Togw'as'amatemwa
content:
367 Togw'as'amatemwa

1.
Togw'as' amatemwa,
Kogwa nebibe,
Korabu'okomo,
Nobu'ayande;
Orwane gesacha,
Tiga 'ngencho chimbe,
Rigeria Yeso,
Nagokony'obue.

Saba Omotoria,
Akaoe chinguru,
Nanchet' agokonye,
Nagokony'obue.

2.
Tig'abant'ababe,
chinkwana chimbe,
'Rieta ria Nyasae,
Risike mono;
Nach'ebiri'ebiya,
Ob'omoitongo,
Rigereria Yeso,
Nagokony'obue.

3.
Er'oyorobabue,
Nonyor'egutwa,
'S'okwegena ntobue,
Nonya tokogwa;
Er'Omotori'oito,
Naratokong'ie,
Rigereria Yeso,
Nagokony'obue.

title: 368 'Kero Kia Botuko Gati
content:
368 'Kero Kia Botuko Gati

1.
Kero kia botuko gati,
Malaik' agatera,
Ogotera Kw'Obonene,
'Makan'echahabu;
'Morembe n'obuy'as'ense,
Korw'ase Nyasae,
Ense egakira eigwe,
Malaik' agotera.

2.
Naende abande bagacha,
'Maganda ya Igoro,
'Gotera okwo gokaigweka,
'b'ense yarosire;
Igoro y'ebitii ebio,
Bakairurukao,
'Riogi riabo nikaigweka
as'ens'ey'embe.

3.
'Ba more inse y'egurube,
'Ba mwaisire gokwa,
Mwechandete as'enchera,
Y'emechand'emenge;
Rora engaki y'obuya,
Ngoch'er 'as' obwango,
Timok'as'encher' ensemo,
Moigwe bagotera.

title: 369 Nomwegene Yeso
content:
369 Nomwegene Yeso

1.
Nomwegene Yeso and' onsi as' ore?;
Nar' enkoro yao kera rituko?
Nor' omworokigwa? motemo' orore;
Nak'Omoika, omonge kegima.

'Bogim' obonge, 'bogim' bonge;
Erio babe n'obogim' obonge
'Bogim' obonge, 'bogim' obonge;
Erio nabe n'obogim' obonge.

2.
'S'obwanchani bwaye, orari'erieta,
Ri'Omotori'omuya, orwete igoro,
Bachenu sasima ase Ring'ana;
Rikorw' ogotorek' as' amanyinga.

3.
Inchwo mwegenete, 'gw'okorangeria;
Bionsi korw' as' Are, naye moe bo,
Yeso nagwanchere Korach'as'Are;
Naka'ogosesenigw'okonene.

title: 370 Orogendo Rwa Yeso
content:
370 Orogendo Rwa Yeso

1.
Orogendo rwa Yeso,
Mogoko noyoino,
Motunyane Yeso
Oino Imanweli.

2.
Koborab'obororo,
Tari ban'obwaye,
Enchera mogoeta,
Nero aetete.

3.
'Mosalaba O Yeso,
Nainwe moimokie,
N'engata abegetwe,
Nainwe negwenerete.

4.
Ogwanch'okwo okwaye,
Mobe nakorokwo,
Na Obwanchani bwaye,
Boikaranse nainwe.

5.
Chingencho mwakorerwe
mwanche igo nomokia,
Mwensi morek' enchera
igo bun' etaya.

6.
'Bororo n'emekono,
N'emechando Yaino;
Ogotemwa ao ao,
Goika ogokwa kwaino.

7.
Yonsi nero eng'eria,
Bun'Ere anyorete,
Nebe buna obororo,
Igoro korw'ense.

8.
Orogendo rwa Yeso,
Rigereria Igoro;
'Mechando Y'ense'eye,
Nyebue asare.
